title: Deep mediterranean quiche
alt: A delicious deep layered Mediterranean quiche, sliced.
summary: An Italian inspired quiche with sun dried tomatoes and courgette. A perfect light meal for a summer's day.
author: Umami
ingredients: For the pastry:,280g plain flour,140g butter,Cold water,For the filling:,1 onion (chopped),2 cloves of garlic (chopped),Half courgette (chopped),450ml soya milk,500g grated parmesan,2 eggs,200g sun dried tomatoes,100g feta

title: Vegan chocolate brownies
alt: A plate with a vegan chocolate brownie covered in dark vegan chocolate
summary: These sumptuous brownies should be gooey on the inside and crisp on the outside. A perfect indulgence!
author: Umami
ingredients: 170g self-raising flour, 3 tablespoons of cocoa powder, 170g of caster sugar, 5 tablespoons of vegetable oil, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, A pinch of salt, 230ml soy milk

title: Super easy vegetarian pasta bake
alt: Cheesy pasta dish with vegetarian sausages and topped with Mozzarella
summary: A wholesome pasta bake is the ultimate comfort food. This delicious bake is super quick to prepare and an ideal midweek meal for all the family.
author: Umami
ingredients: 400g wholewheat pasta, 1 chopped onion, 2 cloves of garlic, 1 pack of vegetarian sausages, 1 tin of chopped tomatoes, 50g of sliced sun dried tomatoes, Pinch of sugar, 3 tablespoons of red pesto, 50g cheddar cheese, Basil or mixed herbs, 100g mozzarella

title: Watercress soup
alt: Light and simply presented watercress soup with a sprig of coriander to finish
summary: A wonderfully simple and light soup, making the most of seasonal, local produce.
author: Umami
ingredients: 3 bunches of watercress,3 potatoes,3 onions,2 leeks,800ml stock,5 tablespoons of crème fraîche

title: Victoria sponge cake
alt: A classic, uncut Victoria sponge with a deep filling of butter cream and jam
summary: A traditional Victoria sponge cake, perfect for any afternoon with a cup of tea.
author: Umami
ingredients: 225g butter or margarine,225g caster sugar,225g self-raising flour,4 eggs,1 level teaspoon of baking powder,3 tablespoons of jam for the filling,Icing sugar to dust the top,Cream to serve

title: Gluten free pizza
alt: Olives, basil and mozzarella top a gluten free pizza base
summary: A gorgeous and simple gluten free pizza, with deliciously indulgent mozzeralla and Parma ham. Can easily be vegetarian by leaving out the ham.
author: Umami
ingredients: 400g gluten free flour, 125ml warm water, 125ml milk, 1 sachet of dried yeast, 2 teaspoons of sugar, 1 teaspoons of salt, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 4 tablespoons of tomato puree, 1 clove of garlic, Some fresh basil, 200g of mozzarella, 100g rocket, 5 slices of Parma ham

title: Thai green curry
alt: A traditional bowl of creamy, aromatic Thai green curry with chunks of chicken and a small bowl of jasmine rice.
summary: A quick and easy version of the classic Thai green curry. Perfect for a midweek meal!
author: Umami
ingredients: 400g coconut milk, 400g chicken or tofu, 1 tablespoon of Thai green curry paste, 1 clove of garlic, 2 teaspoons of fish sauce, 400g mushrooms, 200g green beans, Fresh coriander leaves, Jasmine rice
